Name.repository: University of California, Los Angeles. Library. Department of Special Collections
Author: Luqmān, $c the Sage
Title: Sad pand
Source: Caro Minasian Collection of Persian and Arabic Manuscripts, box 63, 457
Description.abstract: The first page of the manuscript is illuminated. Luqmān-I Ḥakīm wrote the work for his son Muḥammad Bāqir Khān Bīgolrabīgī. An edition by ʿAbd al-Ḥusayn Ihsānī (Tehran: Intishārāt-I Irānmihr, 1344 (1965)) is available.
Description.citation: Muḥammad Taqī Dānish-pazhūh, Fihrist-i Nushahhā-yi khaṭṭī, daftar 11 & 12 (Ṭihrān: Intishārāt-i Dānishgāh-i Ṭihrān, 1039 AH), p. 62.

Source: Caro Minasian Collection of Persian and Arabic Manuscripts, box 76, 551
